page.title: 07BISHOP GOODWIN JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: {Bishop Goodwin Junior School}is the only Church of England school in Carlisle. The present building has been open since 1972 and before that the school was on a site now occupied by a supermarket. Our school is an open plan design in two units either side of a hall. Each unit has four classes who share the resources between them. Also on the same campus is Bishop Goodwin Infant School. Most of the present fourth year have been to both schools. In 1985 Mr. D.J. Thomas retired after being the Headteacher of the junior school for eighteen years. The pupils who left for secondary school performed {"Joseph and his Amazing {Technicolour Dreamcoat"}a musical, by Andrew LLoyd Webber and Tim Rice.
